website_summaries.verdict: WeatherPRO has you covered with a universal-fit mower cover that shields your push mower from the elements.
pros: Marine-grade polyester with a co-polymer additives provides heavy-duty protection
Provides UV protection and water repellency
Works with electric and gas push mowers
cons: Cover is thin and some buyers have said it does not hold up as they would expect
The slightest wind will blow it away, according to some

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, doesn't last. Had to replace less than 2 years later.
customer_reviews.text: It fits nicely. Good draw string makes it secure. I bought it August, 2016. Having to buy another May 2018. It lasted 21 months before it just fell apart. Doesn't handle Texas sun and heat well at all. Not much does. Still...21 months is not good.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernFried

customer_reviews.title: I have that same mower as in the picture, and the fit isn't great.
customer_reviews.text: 22" recycler toro.. The top part fits well, but the part that snugs around the front wheels doesn't want to fully cover both. It isn't quite deep enough. It's possibly not a huge problem, but I'm thinking it may ride up given some winds. Slightly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Breaddrink

customer_reviews.title: SMART IDEA - GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Glad I ordered this cover for my electric mower. It's a pain rolling the machine in and out of the shed all summer, especially after mowing. Puff, puff. It seems to be very good quality and it fits fine. This company makes covers, so they know what works. The wrapping detail is a learning experience. But it's a relief not worrying about rainy days causing damage to my machine. It's one of those modest investments that make life that much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Adsit

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, functional!!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is lighter in weight than other covers we've had, but it protects well! It felt very light at first, but that makes it so easy to get on and off. The part that goes over the handle is deeper and slips on so nicely! Though it's not got elastic at the wheel end, it is long enough that I just tuck it under the wheels. No fighting to pull it over the wheels. So pleasant to put on and remove! This is the first season using it, so I can't comment on log-term durability, but I'm very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof? Hmmm...
customer_reviews.text: The cover is VERY large, so it does not fit very snugly on my standard sized mower. It is also awkward to use the string closure as it never tightens enough and I practically have to lay the mower back on its handle to get to it. Not particularly sold on the weatherproof claim either; I still find water puddles in bolt holes and on the top of the deck after a rain, but it's better than no cover, so I'll continue using until it needs replacing. I would suggest to the manufacturer to change the single string pull design to two pulls as it would make fitting this generic sized cover to a wider variety of mowers much easier.
customer_reviews.author: KayDee

customer_reviews.title: After Four Years Still Protecting My Mower!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually wax so euphoric over a product but this cover has protected my mower for four years and still is quite usable. The mower is stored outside under an eave of the house so it gets plenty of "weather" but it remains protected by this cover. My off-brand mower is five years old, bought refurbished from HD, and it still runs well after being protected by this cover. Bottom line it was a great purchase and i would buy it again - except it's still doing what it claims to do!
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Mostly worked for 15 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May 2016. In August 2017, the edge of it caught in the mower and tore (not product's fault). But for 15 months of outside use, it was noticeably bleached and cracked so I bought a different replacement. It did keep the electric mower dry and in working condtion in those 15 months. It often needed to be refastened during bad wind events, but what can you do.
customer_reviews.author: Gerbil

customer_reviews.title: Kept my mower dry and completely covers it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover for a new honda push mower that I want to keep it protected from the weather. Honda's are not cheap so I needed some way to keep it protected because I have no shed to store it. I've only had it a few months but so far its great! Protects it from the sun and rain.. and we can get some torrential rain as I call it! This cover kept it dry. Also, the pull string to tighten it down worked great keeping it in place with the winds we get as well. So far works great!! Oh and it completely covers the mower and its light weight.. no struggling with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Toro mower well, and worked well for two years
customer_reviews.text: This one replaced the cover made by Backyard Basics (which started to tear after one year and practically crumbled into little pieces after two years -- probably from UV damage in the northern California sun). The Weather Pro cover fit the mower very well and I had no problem with it for two years. Then the fabric (which is a bit thin) started to rip at stress points but was usable for better part of the third year. Now it's just over three years old and it's ripping even at the slightest tug and will be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Ajit

customer_reviews.title: Lawn mower cover does its job!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Troy Built 21" walk behind gas mower. I was quite surprised when I opened the cover package as the shape of the cover looked strange. My mower has a rear bag on it. This cover completely enveloped the handle, clipping bag as well the wheels. I put the cover over the front and pulled the cord which pulled the entire cover taught. No way is this cover going to be blown-off by wind. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Roiz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to keep the lawnmower dry since don't have a shed/garage to store it in. This covers it well and the water resistance is great. After it rained, the water was sitting in droplets on top of the cover and the mower was dry. I can't really comment on long term durability as I have only had it a couple weeks at this time but so far it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Savarino

customer_reviews.title: great cover
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice cover for the money. my previous cover blew off in a mild storm. I bought the previous one on amazon and it lasted about a year before the wind took it. this one has a drawstring at the front to secure it. i also found it easier to install than my previous one. The material is medium weight. i am impressed so far. i believe it is a universal size and should fit most normal push mowers.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my mower dry but since the draw string is ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my mower dry but since the draw string is up front it ends up sitting in the rain water, mud, etc and gets gross. I haven't found a solution to keep the drawstring out of the muck. if anyone has any ideas let me know. I wish the draw string came out the back with the ability to attach it somewhere under the handle area using stitched in velcro strap or just a longer string that I could hook to the top of the handles. But for $26, i can't really complain too much. it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: A. Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Great mower cover! Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this same mower cover for 4 years and it’s been perfect for my mower. I accidentally tore the cover (my fault) and purchased the same one again because it was so great. I have stored my mower with this cover outdoors for 4 years with no damage to my mower. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tammymurphy000

customer_reviews.title: Outperforming my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This cover is well worth the $20 spent. Living in the Phoenix Arizona area anything left outside is subject to sun and monsoon rain damage. So far, the cover is doing an excellent job protecting my lawnmower from the elements. I noticed that the cover is currently unavailable, but I would highly recommend purchasing one if you leave your equipment outside.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my push mower dry.
customer_reviews.text: My last push mower it actually rotted even the metal, was still running great, but after five years , the wheels just fall off. So this cover is very long and goes down all the way to the floor, and it keeps my machine dry. Also the quality of the cover is GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: 100% happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a temporary cover for my lawnmower while waiting to purchase our next home. Good solution to having no shed or garage. I'm not sure how this product would perform if used long term. Haply with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Maczonis

customer_reviews.title: Fits Just Right
customer_reviews.text: We had to move our mower from the garage to our patio and bought the cover for protection. It fit our mower perfectly and has kept it dry in the recent thunderstorms. Durability will be tested throughout the hot Texas summer and cool, wet winter to come.
customer_reviews.author: Julieko

customer_reviews.title: Had to fight to put it on...
customer_reviews.text: I guess a nice material against the weather. But is a real challenge to put the mower in. or the cover on top of the mower. I was hoping for a different kind of cover. I will not buy again nor recommend to anyone. Is just very annoying especially if you are in a hurry.....
customer_reviews.author: Sally F. G

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover has lasted at least a couple of years now and is still holding up. It sits on the side of the house with the cover and is exposed to the elements. It has help up well and has kept the mower protected.
customer_reviews.author: TX Lady Triker

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I personally find the cover difficult to use as intended. There's not enough fabric to cover both the front and rear wheels. The draw string at the front is also hidden when trying to cover the mower, one needs to tilt the mower backwards in order to get the cover under the front wheels. Not really user friendly. Almost a two person job to get the cover in place and secured. I may replace the the draw string with a light weight bungee cord material so it will hug the front tires better without struggling to cinch the string.
customer_reviews.author: JOAT

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not as described. Not suitable for year round outdoor exposure.
customer_reviews.text: Premium? Heavy duty? Lol. Get the lawn boy 215326. This thing is an overpriced hefty bag.
customer_reviews.author: Juss Taguy

customer_reviews.title: Expect to replace every 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 1.5 years. Top is bleaching in the sun now and is weakening. Bottom of front that goes under wheels has shredded (zero reinforcement).
customer_reviews.author: ANerd

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fits great only had for about a month went through heavy rain so far and 60 mph winds so far so good. Cover was great till hurricane force winds came though and sent it sailing away to a new home so now have to buy a new one to replace it :(
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Works just like advertised/ Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Works just like advertised/ Fits like a glove. Easy to put on and take off. This has allowed me to keep my mower free from dust and water.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L Holt

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend it at first, but only lasted 15 months before bry rotting
customer_reviews.text: I keep my lawnmower outside and this cover protects it from everything. Definitely recommend it (15 months later and it has dry rotted and ripped in multiple places after pulling the cover over the lawn mower the past few uses). Was under the impression it woulda lasted way longer then 15 months. I’m sadly changing my review from a 5 Star to a 1
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Cover to Protect Your Investment
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how much you paid for your lawn mower, but my Honda wasn't cheap. It's a little oversize but it has an adjustable drawstring at the bottom to tighten the cover nicely.
customer_reviews.author: jm30534

customer_reviews.title: Lawn mower cover by WeatherPRO Covers
customer_reviews.text: This cover seems to be a good one. It fits my mower well, is easy to put on and take off. I do have one thing about it that I don't like and that is that it is black. Because my mower does sit outside in the sun, the black makes it extremely hot. I would have suggested they used a lighter color to reflect the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Smith

customer_reviews.title: it has lasted time, weather, and is no worse from wear!!
customer_reviews.text: best fit, easy to place & remove, kept my mower waterproof and it sits outside in the elements, hasnt faded from the sun , dry rotted or torn at the seams , kept my mower dry, spotless, and undamaged from the thunderous storms and hot sun, I'm glad to invest in a valuable item that saves my expensive items from ruin!
customer_reviews.author: terry b.

customer_reviews.title: It is great
customer_reviews.text: No problem installing it over the mower. Love the draw string to enclose it. It shipped so quickly. Ordered it on Friday and had it on Sunday morning. Surprised but very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce F. Schmack

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: We use it mostly for indoor covering of the lawn mower In the garage, but seems to do the job. Isn’t very thick but is very easy to put on and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri223

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cover for well over a year and it has held up great. It has faded a little bit, but does not have any holes and keeps my mower dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Will do the job just fine
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to get the cover that I ordered. It fits very well. The only think that I would have preferred is that the material be a little thicker. I'm quite content with it though.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great product to protect your mower!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two push mowers because my yard is very small- I have two of these lawnmower covers for over a year! They are a great value for the money and work great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Love the coverage given by product
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage given by product. Wish that it would tighten up more to prevent the wind from blowing it off toward the engine part of mower.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my sister two Michigan winters ago. It's been outside year 'round the whole time and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Two years of 24/7 weather...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for two years now, it is out in all kinds of weather, still doing a great job of protecting my mower.
customer_reviews.author: SuperJack

customer_reviews.title: I bought this this 3 months ago, it hasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this this 3 months ago, it hasn't ripped or faded yet, however the cover itself is very thin and I foresee it lasting only a year. Make sure you mail in the paperwork to extend the one year warranty to two, I did.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product. Sorry no photo available was a gift given to a friend whom which says it was exactly what he needed. Perfect fit and it serves the purpose of protecting his equipment from inclement weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little big that’s my only complaint. Other than that it’s good for what I need it for and covers the lawnmower.
customer_reviews.author: StrawberryBell

customer_reviews.title: Good lawnmower cover
customer_reviews.text: Overall this cover does a great job of doing what it's designed to, cover the lawnmower. The fabric is a little thin and I believe in a few years a replacement will be needed. Only time will tell but if you need a push lawnmower cover I can definitely recommend this one as it is easy to use and also has an adjustable string to tighten the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P

customer_reviews.title: The cover seems to be of good construction and my guess is it will last longer ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was prompt, no complaints there! The cover seems to be of good construction and my guess is it will last longer than the Craftsman cover I got previously. Problem here is it takes time to know how it will stand up to the elements. I'll provide an update in a few years... The cover fits well, room to spare! I found it somewhat difficult to cinch the draw-string and getting it to stay fixed around the rear wheels of the mower. I've only used it once and suspect over time I'll figure out a solution. In my opinion a round string would work better than the flat one provided.
customer_reviews.author: C Nick

customer_reviews.title: Durable cover.
customer_reviews.text: We we’re running out of room in the carport. This cover works great to store the lawnmower outside.
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, fits well
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed and it covers my machine well even with a big catch bag attached. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a Honda Lawn Mower with handles extended..
customer_reviews.text: Description says fits large movers, but with my handles extended it did not fit a Honda push mower. The cover would barely fit and was convenient to lock it under the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: This cover is made well and will protect.
customer_reviews.text: This fits the mower like a glove and will protect the mower all winter.
customer_reviews.author: Old Guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover, fit and finish very nice
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement cover, original one was destroyed by the sun. Lasted over 5 years so highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Light and tight
customer_reviews.text: Light and tight weather protection for your mower. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jim

customer_reviews.title: Durable water-resistant
customer_reviews.text: It covers the whole lawnmower. Protects it from water and sun. I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits OK. Will blow off so I have to weigh it down with the front wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product, I cover my mower and leave in the Florida weather all year around. Can not comment on durability only had cover for several months but so far Ok' cover is very large so will need to bungee to keep on.
customer_reviews.author: Old Marine

customer_reviews.title: No separate battery
customer_reviews.text: It gets stuck sometimes and I thought it had a separate battery,
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Great price great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product great price fits very well strong material very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Tony Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The size of what you are trying to cover,
customer_reviews.text: Has been outside covering the lawn mower now for a month, hasn't blown off, does not have any holes.
customer_reviews.author: Daryn Bundtrock

customer_reviews.title: cover fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Overall this cover fit perfectly and seems to be well made in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for low cost
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and product fit perfectly. Had several heavy wind and rain storms and held up great. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: caniac27

customer_reviews.title: Second Time Around
customer_reviews.text: Great product! First time around this product held up outside through 4 hot, humid Georgia summers and rainy winters - purchased this identical replacement after original cover got torn by mishandling.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Using this to keep my reel mower outside for the summer months. Several torrential rain storms already this spring, plus an unexpected 8" snow storm in mid may in Colorado. This kept my mower well covered and dry. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: snowshoes

customer_reviews.title: Save my mower
customer_reviews.text: Your mower cover is exactly what I want to protect the investment made in my lawn mower.
customer_reviews.author: bruce d terry

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great mower fit. I like it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take Cover
customer_reviews.text: I like this cover. It's basically just Cordura type nylon, it's not 'coated' or rubberized, so it's not going to fall apart or start peeling. It does what it has to do, just holding off voluminous amounts of water during rain storms, that sort of thing, but it breathes and is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want.
customer_reviews.text: This is a first class, quality product. As a sailor, I immediately looked at the seams to see how they had been manufactured and executed. I was impressed to see they had been "double sewn" for additional strength. The draw string to keep the cover secure around the mower is important for successful use - and having a storage bag for the cover is a nice touch. Finally, it is gratifying to see a Company that clearly cares about quality and customer service. These important factors are too often missing in today's marketplace. If you are looking for a lawn mower cover, this is the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get cover...Protects well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hubbys lawn mower. He has a self propelled one he needed to protect. It fit great. Well made and well worth the price. It gives me peace of mind to know he doesn't have to worry if it rains now. His mower is protected. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian M

customer_reviews.title: Storm proof, does its job.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product that is easy to use. Slid it over the handle cinch it up and leave it. I put mine on by wrapping it under the wheels then cinching down the front. It has been through several SC storms and not batted an eye. My mower has stayed dry and has had no moisture build up under the cover.
customer_reviews.author: USMCSurvivalist85

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my lawnmower. Big enough to cover it well.
customer_reviews.author: Lrhae

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We recently had major landscaping done and can no longer simply push the lawn mower to the garage. It'll be another year before we can afford a big shed in back, so until then this works perfectly under the eves of the house to protect our mower from weather.
customer_reviews.author: K. Klett

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover and recommend provided you take measurements
customer_reviews.text: This product was wonderful, however, I neglected to measure my lawn mower and this was simply too big. If you are looking for a quality item to protect your law mower, I would definitely recommend this item. Just be sure to measure and you will be very pleased with your purchase
customer_reviews.author: Betty C.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Quality wasn't as good as I hoped and neither was fit. However it is on the big side which means it will last longer since there is no stress on the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Works well and simple to place on the mower
customer_reviews.author: Denise Burns

customer_reviews.title: One thing that surprised me is that the material seems to be thin and looks like it could be torn off easily
customer_reviews.text: The cover a little too big for my Toro self-propelled mower but at least it covers well. One thing that surprised me is that the material seems to be thin and looks like it could be torn off easily, not 'thick and sturdy', etc. like other review has been raving about.
customer_reviews.author: Texmit

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, waterproof and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, fit fairly well, you have to play with the drawstring.
customer_reviews.author: MIchelle Toler

customer_reviews.title: the cover is well made and a good quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my new push mower, and it is facing harsh Texas sun and heat, but it has kept my mower in new condition
customer_reviews.author: lynn Woodworth

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've found to date.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple of years and it is holding up quit well in all types of weather. Much better than most other types I have had. UV rays seem to be the major problem as it is outside in the sun most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Gratz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, why did I wait so long to get this!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kossick

customer_reviews.title: 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: This ones a winner. Waterproof, easy to put on/take off. It's holding up against the south Florida sunshine. No fading or discoloration. The material is solid, not light and flimsy. Very durable. Yup if your looking around, definitely purchase this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Davies

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only held up for a few months after rain and wind:-(
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Stayed on during extremely high winds, although it worked like a sail and took our lawnmower out from under the carport and about 30 feet away into the grass! It's definitely durable!
customer_reviews.author: FamilyofEight

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Remington Rm360 (Awesome by the way). For now she's left out in the open. Had to cover. Well, this is just perfect!!! Fits well and draw string in front allows for a custom fit. Made well. Fabric is light but strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy G.

customer_reviews.title: My mower's life saver😁
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved my lawn mower cover. Seems durable. I purchased one also for my daughter. We both just had to buy new mowers. I put the cover on today. We're supposed to have a lot of rain next week. I'm excited with my item😊
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Bush

customer_reviews.title: Dry and tight.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Cover has been through a couple of good rainstorms and has stayed in place and kept mower dry.
customer_reviews.author: BLS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Wish it had an elastic band on the bottom so it would stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Robin R. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality and a little big so i can fit other things under to store for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Cole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The best I've ever bought and it really is waterproof, unlike the others I've purchased that claimed to be and weren't. The fit is excellent too and adaptable to pretty much any push type mower.
customer_reviews.author: R. Michael Oguin

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, easy to use. Putting it to the test this coming winter.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Lawnmower cover
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for 2 weeks. So far it works and fits my older (14+ years) walk-behind John Deere push mower. Only time will tell how durable it is. Price seemed fair. I would rate it 5 stars if I knew if would last. Will wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: OneBigBuckeye

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would be better. The material feels pretty thin
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be better. The material feels pretty thin. I am not sure how well this will hold up over time and I think it is stretch to call it "waterproof". I am still happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette B

customer_reviews.title: Great Lawn Mower Cover
customer_reviews.text: This lawn mower cover is very nicely made. The shape is great to cover all aspects of the mower and the material is of good quality. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Z.

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover and stays on nice on those windy days
customer_reviews.text: Quality cover and stays on nice on those windy days. The cover is holding up well so far to the weather and sun for the few months I've had it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley George

customer_reviews.title: Thick water resistant.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover, it works well. With my Toro push mower.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: It has worked well but has faded immensely even in ...
customer_reviews.text: It has worked well but has faded immensely even in partial shade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Mower Cover
customer_reviews.text: Item arrive very fast. I'm a happy customer with this item. It cover my entire lawn mower (Honda mower), material made of feels of very good quality. I only have this cover for a few weeks, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Risig

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and service. Works perfectly on my mower. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: rainbow

customer_reviews.title: water proof
customer_reviews.text: great cover, roomy and covers the rear bag collector...fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Eggs4me

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE!! Cheap nylon used and ripped after just one time use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mae McDade

customer_reviews.title: Will not last much more than 1 year in the sun.
customer_reviews.text: It lasted a little over one year and it had several holes in the cover in about 15 months. I purchased this cover in April 2017 and it is now April 17, 2019 and the cover has many more holes. Used it in Savannah, GA on a Husqvarna AWD lawn mower.
customer_reviews.author: George G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice covers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. Plenty of room for my mowers. Well made. Easy to use. So nice to have the mowers outside and protected and not taking up all the room in the shed!!! Wish I'd purchased these months ago...
customer_reviews.author: kat c

customer_reviews.title: Darn thing actually works
customer_reviews.text: I put it on right before a major thunderstorm the next day it was bone dry underneath darn thing actually works it's a little tight for my Husqvarna but definitely would buy this again and recommend it to others
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Decent cover for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered last night and got here today. What? Really? Provides decent cover for my toro gas mower. Love the way it cinches in the front to tighten around the wheel base. Should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Fernandez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It keeps the rain out.
customer_reviews.text: It works good. Its just a little bigger then my mower. I just tuck it under so all is covered.
customer_reviews.author: L.K.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we bought (for a second lawn mower so obviously we like them. The are easy to put on and so far haven't deteriorated in the AZ sun.
customer_reviews.author: L. Olson

product_meta.title: Lawn Mower Cover - Waterproof, Premium Heavy Duty - Manufacturer Guaranteed - Weather and UV Protected Covering for Push Mowers - Secure Draw String and Large Size for Universal Fit
product_meta.description: PRODUCT This WeatherPRO Cover is tear resistant, made with superior 300D material and Polyurethane lining and protects your mower. It’s premium quality lasts longer than inferior products and gives your mower longer life. Fits virtually all makes and models including gas and electric mowers and covers both the mower and attached bagger on rear-discharge mowers. Convenient storage bag included. BENEFITS Gives indoor/outdoor all-weather protection through the seasons. Fortifies against rust, dirt, dust, leaves, pollen, pine sap, birds, etc. Generously large and easy to use so there’s no need to wrestle with a tight fit or elastic hems – simply slip it on and use the draw cord to tighten for a Universal Fit. Fits walk behind lawn mowers including: Craftsman, Husqvarna, John Deere, Sears, Honda - virtually all makes and models. Fits many smaller snow blowers too. BETTER QUALITY - GUARANTEED! WeatherPRO Covers provide the best protection and will not crack in cold weather conditions. Manufacturer Guaranteed for a full year. ORDER TODAY SAVE OVER 25% RIGHT NOW! Limited Time Special pricing in effect- Add your WeatherPRO Cover to your shopping cart now. Eligible for FAST FREE Amazon shipping with hassle-free return policy. We specialize in protecting your equipment... We Know Covers! Conveniently fits Toro, Troy Bilt, Greenworks, Lawn Boy, Snapper, MTD, Murray, Briggs and Stratton, Ariens, Cub Cadet, Weed Eater, Yard Machines, Worx, Black & Decker, Poulan, Kobalt, Ryobi, Homelite, Bolens and many more!
feature_bullets: PROTECTS YOUR INVESTMENT – WeatherPRO Covers keeps your Push Mower out of extreme elements while storing. 100% Marine-Grade advanced Polyester material with special co-polymer additives assure UV protection and water repellency. That's how we can offer the best Manufacturer's Guarantee in the industry!
DURABLE - Heavy Duty, Tear Resistant Push Mower Cover saves your equipment from rain, snow, sun, leaves, pine sap, pollen, dust, dirt, wind and birds.
WATER RESISTANT - Protects against harmful UV rays, and Universal size fits virtually all push type Electric or Gas lawn mowers
EASY TO USE - Draw cord at bottom assures a tight fit around the complete lawn mower for full protection. · BONUS! - Handy Storage Bag will be included with your order at No Charge!
BEST GUARANTEE - You get a Full 100% NO QUESTIONS ASKED one year manufacturer guarantee! You will be happy and you will be satisfied.
